description: The post-Brexit trade deal has been met with a mixture of relief, sadness and optimism in Europe.
title: Brexit: How European leaders reacted to EU-UK trade deal
title_page: Brexit: How European leaders reacted to EU-UK trade deal - BBC News
maintext: "It was a long and winding road. But we have got a good deal to show for it. It is fair, it is a balanced deal, and it is the right and responsible thing to do for both sides.
